subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The last time the Mets faced elimination in Game 6 of a postseason series at home, it was 1986. But the situation for the Mets going into last night’s Game 6 was a little bleaker.
snippet: The last time the Mets faced elimination in Game 6 of a postseason series at home, it was 1986. But the situation for the Mets going into last night’s Game 6 was a little bleaker.
